archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Comms Marketing and Recruitment
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation:
2012: Applicant lifecycle working group was launched, looking at open days through applying and being transitioned to being at UoB (note that there is also a Transitions Working Group)
2011: See the Recruiting Diversity section of John Davis' diag @ 2011 (talks about placements, years away, providing more flexible UG and PG pathways and learning programmes) Also talks about Identifying Trends - so there's some BI here
